# Pull Request Template

## Description
Summarize your changes and link to any relevant issues.

## Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Documentation update

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review
- [ ] I have commented my code
- [ ] I have added tests
- [ ] I have updated documentation

---
*Example:*
- Description: Added new endpoint /api/items to return static list
- Type: New feature
- Checklist: All items checked
